comment: /**  * Return the parent bean factory, or {@code null} if there is none.  */
code: /**  * Return the parent bean factory, or {@code null} if there is none.  */ @Nullable BeanFactory getParentBeanFactory().

comment:
/** * Return whether the local bean factory contains a bean of the given name, * ignoring beans defined in ancestor contexts. *

This is an alternative to {@code containsBean}, ignoring a bean * of the given name from an ancestor bean factory. * @param name the name of the bean to query * @return whether a bean with the given name is defined in the local factory * @see BeanFactory#containsBean */
code:
/** * Return whether the local bean factory contains a bean of the given name, * ignoring beans defined in ancestor contexts. *

This is an alternative to {@code containsBean}, ignoring a bean * of the given name from an ancestor bean factory. * @param name the name of the bean to query * @return whether a bean with the given name is defined in the local factory * @see BeanFactory#containsBean */ boolean containsLocalBean(String name).
